captions.text:
Throw on your Link sword and shield hoodie
and whip out your nintendo cartridge credit

card holder because this is episode #13 of
Game LUT.

Turn on this Master Chief Stained Glass lamp,
take a swig out of your Pokéball flask, and

make sure you have all your supplies in this
awesome Fallout Emergency Kit.

Then check on Mr. Wiggles in his Super Mario
Cat Complex and give a friend this Banjo-Kazooie
friendship necklace.

Now get ready for battle with an Elder Scrolls
Nord beard Hat, some Nightingale Armor and

a Team Fortress 2 plush sticky bomb to defend
yourself against this incredible DIY Frost

Dragon papercraft. After your victory, collect
some 3d printed Pokemon Gym badges, relax

on a Gameboy beach towel and flip through
some of your Legend of Zelda Strategy Guide

box set. Then place a pop up Space Invaders
bookmark in it and play Red Eclipse.

Red Eclipse is a really fun and free multiplayer
arena FPS that you can download for Mac, windows
or linux and it is awesome...

Once your done covering the walls with pieces
of your enemies, cover them with some art
prints by Head Glitch...

Then get dressed up with an Assassin's Creed
polo, impress someone special with this beautiful

Earth Bound Zero reproduction cartridge for
the NES, and give that lucky lady an iron

man engagement ring. It'll go great with her
Marvel comic dress, harley quinn sweater and

that Minecraft Diamond Necklace. Very classy.
You should probably keep all those memories

in one of these amazing video game lockets
by Captured My Soul...

But who needs another human being when you
have a Do It Yourself Portable N64, an 8bit

heart pint glass to collect your tears, a
Minecraft red stone ore pillow to cuddle and
this Fire Emblem figurine of Tharja.

And since you're incredibly strong, play video
games with your muscles. The Biofeedback game

controller has muscle sensors that are connected
to your biceps and forearms to control the
actions in the game.

Use that strength to lift a giant Vinyl pitfall
cartridge that will go great with your life

size mario. Standing at almost 5 feet Mario
can be yours for only $2,900 dollars.

Man, my pockets are full after all that LUT
but there is still Brock D. who facebook messaged
me his really cool minimalistic console posters...

So grab your miniature perk machines from
Call of Duty Zombies and subscribe to Vsauce3
for more game lut, just dewitt...tshirt.

Links to everything can be found in the description
below.
I'm Jake and as always, thanks for watching.

I travel to Louisiana once a month. Yes I know all about N O, I've been

there, and it creeped me out and had nightmares. (I hate clowns.)
But I mainly wanted to go to ride the train and eat the good food. It's 
only for a weekend. ﻿

PS: TOFU!!!! Give me a break......
comments.author: sajohaynes

comments.text:
+sajohaynes
Incase you haven't heard, New Orleans is still a shithole & full of random 
street attacks.
If your CCW permit is valid in Louisiana then make sure you have lots of 
spare ammo.
If not, they say Baton Rouge is cleaner & has less shit there.
Sadly, you need to speak Quebec French to get by in Baton Rouge.
Seafood, maybe you should have a plate of oysters with your tofu & seaweed.
